title: India should aim to become clean energy exporter by 2030: Amitabh Kant
description: Amitabh Kant emphasizes India's goal to achieve 750 GW of renewable energy capacity and become a clean energy exporter by 2030. He suggests establishing strong financial systems and leveraging international funds to meet renewable energy targets, focusing on green hydrogen and decarbonizing sectors like steel and transport.
